name: Slack bot starter
description: A starter for making a Slack bot

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: Found in Slack/New App/Oauth and Permissions. Can be set later

SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET.description: Found in Slack/New App/Basic Information. Can be set later

SLACK_WEBHOOK_CHANNEL.description: Channel to report incoming webhook data to. Can be set later.

WEBHOOK_TOKEN.description: A random secret token you create, for other services to communicate to Slack via your bot. Can be set later.
